result: Queestion 176) An executive always travels between cities A and B, which are located at different times. The duration of the plane travel between the two cities is 6 hours. He always takes a flight that leaves A at 15h and arrive in town B at 18h (respctive local times). One day, when I arrived in city B, I knew that I needed to be back in town A at most until 1 pm the next day (local time A). For the executive to arrive in the city at the right time and admitting that there are no delay, he must take a flight from city B, at local time of B, at most (s)
